sentence.Network_en: She described his remarks as irresponsible, inflammatory and outrageous.
sentence.Network_cn: 她称他的话不负责任、具煽动性且极端无礼。

sentence.Network_en: People sported swastikas and walls were covered with inflammatory slogans.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们佩戴着纳粹党的曲十字标志，墙上写满了煽动性口号。

sentence.Network_en: The doctor put me on anti - inflammatory drugs.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...组织学上可分为：腺瘤性（adenomatous）、炎性（inflammatory）或假性息肉（pseudo-adenoma）、增生性（hyperplastic）、错 …
三、炎症（inflammatory） 炎症是机体受到有害刺激时所表现的一系列局部和全身性防御应答，可以看作是非特异免疫的综合作用结 …
何谓发炎（Inflammatory）？发炎是指人体遭到其他理化因素伤害，或是免疫系统为了抵抗外来入侵者，所产生的正常防御反应。

list.abs: There are increased numbers of chronic inflammatory cells lamina propria ., 粘膜固有层慢性炎症细胞数量增加.
炎症介质炎症介质（inflammatory mediators）是一组具有致炎炎症介质作用的化学性物质。 是一组具有致炎作用的内源性化学物 …
diagnosis and treatment of inflammatory bowel disease ., 炎症性肠病的诊治.
生物科学词汇（简体） ... inflammation 炎症；发炎 inflammatory response 炎性反应 inflorescence 花序.

entry.def: If you accuse someone of saying or doing inflammatory things, you mean that what they say or do is likely to make people react very angrily.

example.ex: ...nationalist policies that are too drastic and inflammatory...
example.tran: 过于极端、带有极强煽动性的民族主义政策

example.ex: She described his remarks as irresponsible, inflammatory and outrageous.
example.tran: 她称他的话不负责任、具煽动性且极端无礼。

entry.def: An inflammatory condition or disease is one in which the patient suffers from inflammation.

example.ex: ...the inflammatory reactions that occur in asthma.
example.tran: 哮喘病出现的发炎反应
